entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
